Package org.sakaiproject.genericdao.springjdbc

These spring jdbc based generic DAO implementations can either be used directly to handle persistent object operations in an application or extended to meet more specific needs.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JdbcBasicGenericDao Spring JDBC based implementation of BasicGenericDao which can be extended to add more specialized DAO methods.
JdbcGeneralGenericDao A spring JDBC based implementation of GeneralGenericDao which can be extended to add more specialized DAO methods.
JdbcGenericDao A Spring JDBC (http://hibernate.org/) based implementation of GenericDao which can be extended to add more specialized DAO methods.
SimpleDataMapper This class allows us to generate a DataMapper using Spring or anything else that can set/inject strings to create an object, most of the functions are assumed to be handled automatically by generic DAO
 

Package org.sakaiproject.genericdao.springjdbc Description

These spring jdbc based generic DAO implementations can either be used directly to handle persistent object operations in an application or extended to meet more specific needs.
